channel.title: Comments on: DATAllegro acquisition to enable SQL Server to scale into hundreds of terabytes of data
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Peak
item.dc:creator: Peak
item.description: [...]DATAllegro v3 performs table scans between 0.5TB/minute and 10.5TB/minute. DATAllegro v3 offers new capabilities to handle complex workloads that are a mixture of near real-time loads, long analytical queries and short quick-hit queries.[...]
item.content:encoded: […]DATAllegro v3 performs table scans between 0.5TB/minute and 10.5TB/minute. DATAllegro v3 offers new capabilities to handle complex workloads that are a mixture of near real-time loads, long analytical queries and short quick-hit queries.[…]
